name: The 8th Int'l Conference on Signal and Image Processing
content: The 8th Int'l Conference on Signal and Image Processing(CSIP 2021) Conference Date: January 5-7, 2021 Conference Venue: Sanya, China Website: https://www.seminarjan.org/conference/CSIP2021/ Online Registration System: http://www.seminarjan.org/RegistrationSubmission/default.aspx?ConferenceID=1323 Email: ic\_vicky@163.com The 8th Int'l Conference on Signal and Image Processing(CSIP 2021) will be held in Sanya, China during January 5-7, 2021\. CSIP 2021 will cover issues on Signal and Image Processing. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods. If you wish to serve the conference as an invited speaker, please send email to us with your CV. We'll contact with you asap. Publication and Presentation Publication: Open Access Journal, please contact us for detailed information Index: CNKI and Google Scholar Note: If you want to present your research results but do NOT wish to publish a paper, you may simply submit an Abstract to our Registration System. Contact Us Email: ic\_vicky@163.com Tel: +86 132 6470 2250 QQ: 1349406763 WeChat: 3025797047 Twitter: conf\_Committee Attendance Methods 1.Submit full paper (Regular Attendance+Paper Publication+Presentation) You are welcome to submit full paper, all the accepted papers will be published by Open access journal. 2\. Submit abstract (Regular Attendance+Abstract+Presentation) 3\. Regular Attendance (No Submission Required) Conference Topics Signal Processing Adaptive Signal Processing Array Signal Processing Mobile Signal Processing Medical signal processing Equalization techniques Multidimensional Signal Processing Optical Signal Processing Real Time Signal Processing Signal Reconstruction Statistical Signal Processing Signal Processing for Communications Speech Processing Multimedia Signal Processing Audio and Electro-acoustics DSP Implementations and Embedded Systems Signal Processing Applications Image Processing Image Acquisition Medical Imaging Image Compression Face Recognition Image Segmentation Document Analysis Video Processing Image De-Noising Image Registration Animation and Graphics Remote Sensing 3-D Image Analysis Image/Video Storage Image Retrieval and Authentication Object Tracking Applications of Image Processing
